website_summaries.verdict: Though not as reliable as similarly priced models, this 5-in-1 trimmer is well suited to a variety of trimming and pruning tasks.
pros: With the extra cost comes more power and 5 attachments
Has an 18-inch hedge trimmer blade and an adjustable length of 8.2 feet to 11.4 feet
cons: This trimmer is both heavy and flimsy

website_summaries.verdict: A brush cutter with more capabilities and uses than much of the competition.
pros: Kit comes with 5 attachments for brush cutting, trimming, and pruning to save space and money on tools
Brush cutting attachment offers a large cutting width
cons: Included accessories, such as the gloves and face shield, look cheap and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: We are professional contractors. We did not expect professional grade tools. However, this is trash. I purchased this for my personal home. I hate to have multiple tools and try to find things that serve multiple purposes. This item broke with the first pull of the motor. Items broke as we assembled. Complete trash. We did not use for the first time until several months after we purchased and it was outside the return window. So I will be recycling this heap of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Harper

customer_reviews.title: Weed trimmer / pole saw / multy attachment
customer_reviews.text: This had one heck if a power head , the pole saw works great , I have not used other attachments as of this posting, The only complaint is the ketch on the power extensions are mighty cheep . Make darned sure you tighten them down good
customer_reviews.author: ckloentrup

customer_reviews.title: Spend more money and buy a quality USA-made product instead of this one
customer_reviews.text: Product damaged right out of the box. Quality of some of the parts is highly suspect. The tools that come with the unit are made of soft steel and bend out of shape (I.e. when trying to tension the chain on the chain saw). I order all sorts of small things through Amazon but I finally thought that I would try to start making bigger purchases of equipment etc like this one. Very disappointed, poor quality. Amazon beats some of the responsibility in my opinion for hocking such a low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, strong engine
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Put fuel in it and started right away. I use it every day works as expected . I needed additional extensions so I can trim ivy vine on two story home, contacted seller and they will be providing me extra extensions to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dauta

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this! Not worth the savings. Get a legit brand
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have used the pole saw and the brush cutter. Both are ok on best and down right dangerous on the other side. The brush cutter is held together with a nut over a coupling. The nut keeps loose and ends up loose and oblong orbit. After it goes into higher gear this is going to cause it to fly off someday. The pole saw does not have a great guard and it will get stuff stuck inside of it fairly quicklym the blades went down after three uses.
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Kelsi Brosnahan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get running every time I need to use it. The start/stop switch connectors persists to disconnect. The machine is imbalanced causing it to rotate on the utility rack on the equipment trailer, which results in fuel spillage into the air filter. Very disappointed in this piece. June 2, 2020 So, a new update since my last review. The machine is still very finicky on start-up. I use the machine 2 x’s per week and the drive shaft has warped and is not powering any of the attachments. It is a good work horse, but I remain disappointed that I can’t find replacement parts and it’s still within the one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TreeTrunkTrimmers

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about purchasing this unit due to some of the reviews I had seen on Amazon. I am happy to say that after a month of use this product is working great! The unit is heavy and I would recommend using the strap that is included when operating. Aside from that for the price point all the attachments work and I have been able to complete several projects in my yard. Yes, I know it isn't perfect but when you look at the competitions price point this unit is a steal for the average homeowner.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Its to heavy to use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble and all attachments work good but this thing is to heavy to trim any bush it's dang heavy as all get out!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Trash and cheap
customer_reviews.text: You can start it the 1st time every fast when you turn it off it take forever to restart back up again... The weed eater was over tighten and we couldn't get the bolt off so we can put the weed eater on but couldn't get the bolt off cause they over tighten it. Chain saw was very good cut tree brush off but the chain was easy to get loose and wont say on when you try tighten the chain.. this took was cheap and trash will never buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Daub

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine! Its tougher than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hardcore and heavy! I'm super happy it came with an enhanced strap system. I put it together and brought down a 3 inch sapling with the tri-blade. I'm killing tons of asian bittersweet and this rips straight through it. It's not for the meek. I can only run it for about 15 minutes due to how tough my terrain is and the work this thing can do. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with this purchase. The quality is excellent and the performance was much more than he expected. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power to cost ratio(check)
customer_reviews.text: great power from motor; to change out heads takes nothing. drive shaft is free sliding and vibrates rather well. but for the total price the motor would cost just this much. used hedge weedeater and polesaw so far no complaints so far. The weight after pruning hedges talks to you at the end of the job tho. Make sure you eat your wheaties before tackling alot of bushes.
customer_reviews.author: kn0x

customer_reviews.title: Not top of the line by any stretch
customer_reviews.text: but for the price how can you go wrong? The unit is very heavy compared to anything else out there. It includes the kitchen sink really ! Because of the weight issue I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MikeO

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely surprised by this unit. I have used all of the attachments and have been very pleasantly surprised by how well this unit works. When starting it cold, 2 to 3 pulls and it's running. When it's hot, starts on 1 pull every time. I highly recommend this unit!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It’s garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Less than 5hrs of use and barely starts, bogs down all the time and is leaking fuel.. from the air filter! If you are thinking about buying it RUN AWAY. I bought this to use on a professional level hoping that we could save a little money. Just buy Stijl or echo.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey S

customer_reviews.title: For the money, can't get better
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually surprised as hell at how well this thing operates. There are minor issues that one would expect with a product this cheap, but it rips. Consider it an equivalent to Ikea furniture. It's cheap, serves it's function very well, and when you're ready to upgrade and/or just get rid of it you won't be sad.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for hubby
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Came as advertised within a timely manner. Harness is a bonus as he just had bicep surgery and it is a bit heavy, but as a landscaper, he is very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: Missing lots of parts
customer_reviews.text: So I received the package 2 days ago and it was missing several items including trimmer wire, bush cutters, instructions, gloves etc. I will be contacting the company ASAP and will update with a response.
customer_reviews.author: Bran Mak Sworn

customer_reviews.title: Experience in Assembly Advised.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are so small, they are effectively worthless. I will need to find someone to assist in assembly being no one can read the instructions unless they have eagle vision.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: About what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this commercially. The weed eater attachment has a lot of problems. I've had no problems with the other attachment with the exception of the sprocket guard on the chain saw breaking the first time I used it. For the price it works well I expect to replace the weed eater attachment with a stand alone echo.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Leaks gas
customer_reviews.text: I give it 1 star. Everything you use it to trim a bush or tree. It leaks gas around the cap. Then when you give it gas to tree a tree/ bush its sprays gas out of the cap. As long as you are trimming at a flat level its fine. If you have to raise it on a angle it leaks gas..
customer_reviews.author: carlene matley

customer_reviews.title: Happy as a Hoot Owl.
customer_reviews.text: I trimmed my hedges,this proyama cut my time in half , it is a bit heavy, but I can handle it. During assembly I noticed that I was missing the straight handle the half moon handle I did get. I can’t wait to try the chain saw. I always wanted a multipurpose tool like this. From my order to arrival was only a few days. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Happy. John monchelli

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had product for about 8 months and it is amazing. Have used all attachments and they all exceeded my expectations! Companies customer service is quick to respond and super helpful. Will buy from this company again with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not as light as most weed eaters. It had a much bigger moter
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this he has used it several times now. This company is easy to work with. Everything came in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak weed eater head spool holder
customer_reviews.text: Weed eater part does work excellent but if you get caught up in let's say bailing twine it breaks a part that holds the spool down
customer_reviews.author: marknlisa

customer_reviews.title: This product was a great investment. All attachments work great
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of power equipment from Stihl to Echo, I took a chance and decided I would buy this and see how well it works. This product was a great investment. All attachments work great. It has more power that you need. Yes it’s heavier than other similar products but man up this is built to last. If you want something that will cut anything then this is for you. Most power equipment is built in China or Japan so I wouldn’t worry about it not being American made. Just be a man with a strong back and get your hack on!
customer_reviews.author: Annika Luellen

customer_reviews.title: 42.7cc
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring out the assembly of it al. Only complaint I have is the weight of the motor. But it has been able to satisfy my work needs 🛵
customer_reviews.author: William McIver

customer_reviews.title: Motor is to strong for the metal shaft
customer_reviews.text: The shaft is not strong enough, spent more time trying to fix the too than using it, garbage
customer_reviews.author: Doug F.

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: This more than what i expected! Works very well and very easy to assemble. Heavy and solid so use the body harness that comes with it
customer_reviews.author: gift

customer_reviews.title: When I spend my hard earned money, I want something for it!
customer_reviews.text: It started great the first time. Then it has gotten more difficult each time to start. The plastic parts are brittle and crack very easily. For the amount of money, this is very cheaply made. I bought it because it was recommended by “amazon” I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Staci C.

customer_reviews.title: well worth the price works great.
customer_reviews.text: like all the features , the easy starting and workability
customer_reviews.author: TNphilR

customer_reviews.title: great to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with it but they worked with me to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: johnny d clark

customer_reviews.title: very heavey
customer_reviews.text: very poor instructions. it came with only a manual for one of the tools.
customer_reviews.author: westutica

customer_reviews.title: Gas Head Trimmer- Multi tool
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very powerful. I really appreciate the harness that gives the extra support while the machine is in use. When I had issues the Customer service was excellent. Because of the warranty they replaced a broken part at no charge. This is a great product with great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: colleen Bartz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Engine is heavy but has loads of power. I used the three blade brush cutter , made easy work on thick brush and small trees. Cut my time in half.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Zanitsch

customer_reviews.title: See if they honor the warrenty
customer_reviews.text: had the tool for a week the on off switch is broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lil pricey however with the attachments it’s a great tool for any landscaping person this machine is HEAVY
customer_reviews.author: ALPHAEUS

customer_reviews.title: If you know what you do, perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever others are saying, if you do not know how to use it... but if you know (you do not have to be a professional) it works lime a charm. I am happy and work with it everyday..
customer_reviews.author: M. Broeders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that is easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I hot this for my daughter to use and she absolutely loves it!! Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Y Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item was not what was advertised, the gloves included only had four fingers, really, smh.
customer_reviews.author: Kim V Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: ... year old grandson will use this and so they like it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and my 14 year old grandson will use this and so they like it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Saski

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product and well worth the money. For a homeowner.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price well built. Easy to assemble. The owner manual is not that great but you can figure it out how to put things together.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander David Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Looks good early on
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - seems to be a robust product - bit heavy, that can be alleviated with the harness. Really like the extra extension pole for the saw.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I need a edge attachment for my Proyama multi functional tool.
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful small engine that starts very easy. I don’t like the quick release safety device. It’s not high quality material for a safety device.
customer_reviews.author: MAURICE MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Great value over all.
customer_reviews.text: It's everything it says it is. Build quality is great and start up was easy. Consider this a sthil at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I have only start using the equipment, but so far I am fully satisfied! Looking to buy a next one in a week or two
customer_reviews.author: Earl Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Multi tool!! I experienced a small issue with it, But they were extremely fast to correct it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: machine shut off while working
customer_reviews.text: Engine shut off every 2 minutes while working and you have to re- start if. Cannot finish the job. Where can I get it repair?
customer_reviews.author: Hopeton G.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is so simple and easy to use. We use it for all our lawn needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy, but makes up for it with power!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my trimmer today, I was a little nervous after I read some of the other reviews. But after unboxing and assembly I had a chance to put it through its paces, and man was I surprised. To start out with the engine is quiet, much more quiet than I was expecting. And it produces plenty of power which allows you to operate it at a lower rpm . But it is heavy, this not a machine for the weak of arm. Wearing the harness helps a lot with this. The build quality is on par with other high end Chinese merch. All in all I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andrew westenberg

customer_reviews.title: It is junk! No returns
customer_reviews.text: ~~JUNK!~~ Don’t but it! We got this product, first try, gas tank was cracked, then the shaft broke. We messaged manufacturer, they told us they would send replacement parts, it took forever We repaired it, used it once and it broke again. They aren’t willing to send it back for refund Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I just received my trimmer today I open all the boxes every thing looked good till I started putting things together the harness is for left handed took me a while to figure out how to make it right handed ,.. then the harness hook up was in the wrong place on the trimmer ,just about had to disable the whole lower half to move the harness connection in the right place and when I looked the throttle cable wasn't even connected . Then when moved the connection it made the throttle cable too short .. good thing I'm mechanical incline .. one more thing I'm sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ear protection, face shield and gloves are cheap made China junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get alot for the money
customer_reviews.text: We love the versatility of the Proyama. The ketch for the extension bars broke BUT PROYAMA had great response time to our small issue. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Purchased 3/18/19

product_meta.title: PROYAMA Powerful 42.7cc 5 in 1 Multi functional Trimming Tools,Gas Hedge Trimmer,String Trimmer, Brush Cutter,Pole Saw with Extension Pole
product_meta.description:
FUNCTIONAL 5 in 1 TRIMMING TOOLS

A convenient petrol powered multi-tool which combines a hedge trimmer, pole saw, brush cutter and string trimmer and a extension pole. Powered by a 42.7cc PROYAMA engine for impressive cutting power and reliable and economical running. Perfect for maintenance of your garden or grounds. Ideal for users who require multiple tools but have limited space, or value the convenience of being able to easily swap one attachment for another. Each attachment provides the same fantastic performance as individual machines, resulting in a fantastic finish time after time. 

PACKAGE INCLUDE: 

1 x 42.7cc powerful engine 
1 x gas long reach hedge trimmer
1 x gas pole saw 
1 x gas string trimmer
1 x gas brush cutter
1 x 43 inch extension pole
1 x 40 pronged metal blade
1 x vibration reduction shoulder harness
1 x mixing bottle
1 x ear defenders 
1 x gloves
1 x face shield 
1 x chainsaw bar carrier 
1 x tool kit 
1 x instruction 

TECHNICAL INFORMATION: 

Motor: 1 cylinder, 2-stroke, air-cooled. 
Engine displacement: 42.7 cc. 
Chainsaw blade: 12 " / Total length: 3m25 (extention included).
Hedge trimmer blades: 18 " / Total length: 3m44 (extention included).
The blades of the hedge trimmer are adjustable to the desired angle: horizontal and vertical cutting. 
The stalk shredder is supplied with double 2.4 mm cutting wire and chopper with 3 cutting edges / Total length: 1m86. 
Fuel: mix 1/40. 
Tank capacity: 700 ml. 
Emergency stop button. 
EASY starting system. 
Weight: 5.9 kg without cutter attachment 

Parts and service are available, welcome to contact us by amazon or company email.
feature_bullets: [EPA Certificated Engine] It will discharge less fuel gas in use, and won't cause pollution or do hard to human body
[Powerful Engine] 2HP 2-cycle 42.7cc engine provides more power, it can trim bigger branches efficiently
[Hedge Trimmer] it allow you to make Multi-Angle adjustment [Protection] vibration reduction shoulder harness,ear defenders,gloves, face shield,can all protect and help you when working

[Adjustable Extension Length] This gas powered pole saw can be adjust from 8.2 to 11.4 ft and with 12 inch cutting length. so you can trim 7 ft tall limbs on the ground,and the gas powered chainsaw can provide more power than electric
[One Year Warranty] Welcome to contact us by email for any questions, we'll reply within 24 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
